Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 46th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/2015, off Shayne Funk (MON)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2015, hitting .274 with 13 HR, 63 RBI...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2017, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/30/2017 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2017, hitting .441 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2017, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,510,000 through salary arbitration...
